title: Vegetarian corn chowder
ingredients: ['4 fresh sweetcorn cobs, cleaned', 'melted butter', '1 large onion', '450g fingerling potatoes such as Anya', '1 bunch fresh thyme, or 1 heaped teaspoon dried thyme', '1 bunch fresh chives', '30g butter', '750ml semi-skimmed milk', '75ml single cream', 'salt', '1 teaspoon smoked paprika powder, to taste', 'pepper']
